function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity in government decisions, policies, and important updates","Impact":"Increased confusion and panic among the public, leading to ineffective cooperation with health policies","Mitigation":"Ensure clear and timely communication of decisions, policies, and updates, accompanied by solutions to address public needs","Technologies":"Effective communication channels, social media monitoring tools, decision-making support systems","People":"General public, government officials, public health experts","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, media outlets"},{"Description":"Elevated risk perception influenced by media attention and social media discourse","Impact":"Differential panic levels among the public, leading to ineffective cooperation with health policies","Mitigation":"Monitor and counter misinformation, provide balanced and accurate information, address public concerns proactively","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, misinformation detection algorithms, public sentiment analysis tools","People":"General public, social media users, health communication experts","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, social media platforms"}]}
